commands.about:
टिकट का उपयोग करना आसान है और अत्यधिक विन्यास योग्य टिकट और समर्थन बॉट | 
समर्थन सर्वर:https://discord.gg/ticketsbot
आदेश: टाइप करें `/help`
`/setup` चलाकर शुरू करें
commands.add.no_members: टिकट में जोड़ने के लिए आपको सदस्यों का उल्लेख करना होगा |
commands.add.no_permission: आपको इस टिकट में लोगों को जोड़ने की अनुमति नहीं है
commands.addadmin.owner: सर्वर स्वामी पहले से ही एक व्यवस्थापक है
commands.addsupport.no_members: आपको एक उपयोगकर्ता का उल्लेख करना होगा या एक भूमिका का नाम देना होगा ताकि वह समर्थन प्रतिनिधि विशेषाधिकार प्रदान कर सके
commands.blacklist.no_members: ब्लैकलिस्ट स्थिति को चालू करने के लिए आपको एक उपयोगकर्ता का उल्लेख करना होगा
commands.blacklist.self: आप खुद को ब्लैकलिस्ट नहीं कर सकते
commands.claim.success: आपका टिकट %s द्वारा नियंत्रित किया जाएगा
commands.language.invalid: आपको एक भाषा कोड या ध्वज निर्दिष्ट करने की आवश्यकता है। उपलब्ध भाषाएँ:\n%s
commands.open.ticket_limit: आप एक बार में केवल %d %s खोल सकते हैं
commands.open.too_many_tickets: टिकट श्रेणी में बहुत अधिक टिकट हैं। किसी व्यवस्थापक से कुछ को बंद करने, या उन्हें किसी अन्य श्रेणी में ले जाने के लिए कहें
commands.premium:
आप <https://www.patreon.com/ticketsbot-cloud> से एक प्रीमियम सदस्यता खरीद सकते हैं।
प्रीमियम कई लाभ प्रदान करता है, जैसे:
``diff
+ असीमित टिकट पैनल बनाएं
+ बॉट नाम, अवतार और अनुकूलित करें स्थिति (श्वेत लेबल)
+ सर्वर, उपयोगकर्ताओं और सहायक कर्मचारियों के बारे में विस्तृत आंकड़े
+ संदेशों के पाद लेख में कोई ब्रांडिंग नहीं
+ विकास का समर्थन करें और सर्वर लागतों का भुगतान करने में मेरी सहायता करें
```

वैकल्पिक रूप से, आप यहां वोट कर सकते हैं 24 घंटे के लिए प्रीमियम मुफ्त पाने के लिए <https://vote.ticketbot.net>
commands.premium.invalid_key: अमान्य चाबी। सुनिश्चित करें कि आपने इसे सही तरीके से कॉपी किया है।
commands.remove.no_permission: आपको इस टिकट में लोगों को जोड़ने की अनुमति नहीं है
commands.remove.staff: आप कर्मचारियों को टिकट से नहीं हटा सकते
commands.removeadmin.no_members: व्यवस्थापक विशेषाधिकारों को रद्द करने के लिए आपको एक उपयोगकर्ता का उल्लेख करना होगा या एक भूमिका का नाम देना होगा
commands.removeadmin.owner: गिल्ड का मालिक एक व्यवस्थापक होना चाहिए
commands.removeadmin.self: आप अपने विशेषाधिकारों को रद्द नहीं कर सकते
commands.removesupport.no_members: आपको एक उपयोगकर्ता का उल्लेख करना होगा या एक भूमिका का नाम देना होगा ताकि वह समर्थन प्रतिनिधि विशेषाधिकार प्रदान कर सके
commands.rename.missing_name: आपको इस टिकट के लिए एक नया नाम निर्दिष्ट करना होगा
commands.rename.success: इस टिकट का नाम बदलकर <#%d> कर दिया गया है
commands.tags.create.already_exists: आईडी `%s` वाला एक टैग पहले से मौजूद है। आप `/tag Delete %s`. का उपयोग करके टैग को हटा सकते है
commands.tags.create.invalid_arguments: आपको एक टैग आईडी और सामग्री निर्दिष्ट करनी होगी
commands.tags.create.too_long: टैग आईडी 16 वर्णों से अधिक लंबी नहीं हो सकती
commands.tags.delete.invalid_arguments: हटाने के लिए आपको एक टैग आईडी निर्दिष्ट करनी होगी
commands.tags.get.invalid_arguments: आपको टैग की आईडी प्रदान करनी होगी। टैग के बारे में अधिक सहायता के लिए, <https://tickets.bot/tags> पर जाएं।
commands.tags.get.invalid_tag: अमान्य टैग। टैग के बारे में अधिक सहायता के लिए, <https://tickets.bot/tags> पर जाएं।
commands.tags.list: सभी टैग के लिए आईडी: \n%s\nटैग की सामग्री देखने के लिए, `%stag <ID>` चलाएं
commands.unclaim.not_claimed: इस टिकट का दावा नहीं किया गया है
commands.unclaim.not_claimer: टिकट का दावा करने वाले केवल व्यवस्थापक और उपयोगकर्ता टिकट का दावा नहीं कर सकते हैं
commands.unclaim.success: सभी समर्थन प्रतिनिधि अब टिकट का जवाब दे सकते हैं

premium.subscription_found_content: In order to apply your subscription to this server, the server owner (<@%d>) must add you as an admin **user** (roles are ignored) via the </addadmin:%d> command.\n\nYou can verify that you have been added as an admin user by running </viewstaff:%d>.
premium.success_after_check: Premium is now active in this server!
premium.no_subscription: Could not find an active Patreon subscription linked to your Discord account. Ensure that you [have linked your Patreon and Discord accounts](https://support.patreon.com/hc/en-us/articles/212052266-Get-my-Discord-role), and a further waited 10 minutes.
premium.open_form_description: Press the button below to reopen the form
premium.already_purchased_description: If you have already purchased premium, select the payment method from the dropdown to get started

selector.description: Select which method you used to obtain premium

key.description: Select this option if you were given a giveaway key

patreon.description: Select this option if you made your purchase on Patreon

discord.description: Select this option if you made your purchase within the Discord in-app store

premium.about: Premium gives you access to more panels, statistics, a custom bot and more! Visit our [website](https://tickets.bot/premium) to find out more.
premium.already_activated: Good news! Premium is already active in this server.
premium.already_activated_whitelabel:
Good news! Premium is already active in this server.

For help getting started with whitelabel, read [our whitelabel setup guide](https://docs.tickets.bot/premium/whitelabel-setup-guide).

discord.no_subscription:
Premium can be purchased within Discord directly. Click the button below this message to open the subscription management page.

One purchased, please allow up to 5 minutes for the subscription to be detected.

premium.subscription_found_content_modern: Your Patreon subscription has been found. Please click on the "Open Server Selector" button below in order to open the dashboard to select which servers you wish to apply your premium subscription to.

notes.added_to_existing: You have been added to the existing notes thread: <#%d>
notes.created: A notes thread has been created for this ticket: <#%d>
notes.channel_mode_only: Note threads are only supported in channel mode

rename.ratelimited: Due to limitations imposed by Discord, tickets can only be renamed twice every 10 minutes

vote.no_credits: Redemption failed: you do not have any vote credits!

success.plural: Your vote credits have been redeemed for **%d** days of premium!
success.singular: Your vote credits have been redeemed for **%d** day of premium!

with_credits.plural: You have **%d** vote credits. Click the "Redeem Credits" button below to redeem them for %d days of premium in this server.
with_credits.singular: You have **%d** vote credit. Click the "Redeem Credits" button below to redeem them for %d day of premium in this server.

support.users_warning: -# **Warning:** Users in support teams are now deprecated. Please migrate to roles.

help.switch_panel: Switches a ticket to another ticket panel, changing the channel category, support teams, etc.
help.jump_to_top: Provides you with a button to jump to the top of the ticket
help.on_call: Marks you as on call, to be added and pinged in all new tickets
help.reopen: Reopens a ticket that was previously closed
help.notes: Creates a thread for private discussion between support representatives

auto.docs: Want to explore more? Our [documentation](https://docs.tickets.bot) will teach you how to configure every aspect of the bot!

threads.no_notification_channel: You must provide a ticket notification channel
threads.notification_channel_type: The ticket notification channel must be a text channel

join_thread.closed_ticket: This ticket has already been closed
join_thread.no_permission: You do not have permission to view this type of ticket
join_thread.already_joined: You have already joined this ticket (<#%d>)

open.thread_in_announcement_channel: Threads cannot be created in announcement channels
open.panel_force_disabled: This panel has been disabled. Please ask a server admin to reactivate premium, and run %s in order to re-enable this panel.
open.panel_disabled: The server admins have disabled opening this type of ticket

acl.no_allow_rules: Access to open this type of ticket has been disabled for all roles
acl.deny_listed: You are unable to open this type of ticket because you have the role <@&%d>

not_allow_listed.multiple: You need one of the following roles to open this type of ticket: %s
not_allow_listed.single: You need the following role to open this type of ticket: %s

gdpr.intro: Select the type of GDPR request you would like to make:

section.transcript:
### **Transcript Deletion Options**
-# _Delete transcripts from servers you own_
section.message:
### **Message Anonymization Options**
-# _Anonymize your messages from transcripts in selected servers_

gdpr.warning:
### **Important Information**
* Deletion is **permanent** and cannot be undone
* You can only delete transcripts from servers **you** own
* Only **your** messages can be anonymized in transcripts
* The request may take up to **30 days** to complete
* Your request will be processed in a **queue**
gdpr.resources:
### **Resources**
[What is GDPR?](%s)
[Right to Erasure](%s)
[Right of Access](%s)

modal.specific_messages: Anonymize Your Messages in Specific Tickets

server_ids.label: Server IDs
server_ids.placeholder: Enter server IDs separated by commas (e.g., 1071167333265047653, 1412752753348055111)

ticket_ids.label: Ticket IDs
ticket_ids.placeholder: Enter ticket IDs separated by commas (e.g., 123, 456, 789)

followup.error: ⚠️ Your GDPR request encountered an error: %s
followup.no_data: ℹ️ Your GDPR request has been processed. No data was found.
followup.success: ✅ Your GDPR request has been processed successfully.

error.no_servers: No servers found where you are the owner and have transcripts.
error.invalid_ticket_ids: Invalid ticket IDs provided. Please enter numeric ticket IDs separated by commas (e.g., 123, 456, 789).
error.not_owner: You must be the server owner to delete transcripts.
error.queue_failed: Failed to queue GDPR request. Please try again later.
error.worker_offline: The GDPR processing service is currently unavailable. Please try again later or contact support if this issue persists.

errors.unknown_channel:
Could not find a required channel: it must have been deleted.

Please ask a server administrator to visit the [dashboard](%s) and verify all channel settings are configured correctly.
errors.unknown_member: The user could not be found. They may have left the server or been banned.
errors.unknown_message:
The message you're trying to interact with has been deleted.

Please try the action again with a different message.
errors.unknown_role:
The role required for this action no longer exists.

Please ask a server administrator to visit the [dashboard](%s) and reconfigure role settings.
errors.unknown_category:
Could not find a required category: it must have been deleted.

Please ask a server administrator to visit the [dashboard](%s) and assign a valid channel category to this ticket panel.
errors.unknown_interaction:
This interaction has expired.

Please try the action again.
errors.max_webhooks:
The server has reached the maximum number of webhooks.

Please ask a server administrator to remove some unused webhooks and try again.
errors.interaction_acknowledged:
This interaction has already been processed.

If you need to perform this action again, please start a new interaction.

missing_permissions.title: I am missing the following permissions required to perform this action
missing_permissions.body:
Please assign these permissions to the bot, or alternatively, the `Administrator` permission and try again.
Please visit our [docs](%s) for an explanation of why each permission is required.

errors.invalid_length:
One or more fields are too short or too long.

Please ask a server administrator to visit the [dashboard](%s) and verify all inputs and ensure all fields meet the required length constraints.
errors.required_field:
A required field is missing or empty.

Please ask a server administrator to visit the [dashboard](%s) and verify all required fields are filled out.
errors.invalid_channel_type:
The channel type is invalid for this operation.

Please ask a server administrator to visit the [dashboard](%s) and assign a valid channel to the ticket panel.
errors.invalid_category:
The channel category is invalid, it must have been deleted.

Please ask a server administrator to visit the [dashboard](%s) and assign a valid category to the ticket panel.
errors.invalid_id:
An invalid ID was provided in the bot configuration.

Please ask a server administrator to visit the [dashboard](%s) and verify all category, channel, and role IDs are correct.
errors.invalid_characters:
The input contains invalid characters.

Please use only letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores.
errors.invalid_choice:
An invalid option was provided.

Please ask a server administrator to visit the [dashboard](%s) and verify all settings are correct.
errors.invalid_form: The action could not be completed due to invalid input.
errors.timed_out: The operation timed out, please try again.
errors.rate_limited: You're being rate limited. Please try again %s.
errors.rate_limited_global: Discord is experiencing high load (global rate limit). Please try again %s.
errors.general: An error occurred while performing this action.
